icon_style.CRITICAL: PORTRAIT ONLY. Head and shoulders view. No full body. No background scenes. No props or items in frame. Clean, friendly character portrait.

framing.view: head and shoulders only, cropped at chest level
framing.face_position: centered, eyes in upper third of frame
framing.crop: tight portrait crop, no full body

expression.smile: gentle, welcoming smile or pleasant neutral expression

character_design.style: stylized, slightly cartoonish, game character aesthetic
character_design.proportions: slightly exaggerated for readability (larger eyes, expressive features)
character_design.detail_level: clean and readable at small sizes

background.elements: NONE - no scenery, no props, no items

constraints.no_background: absolutely no background elements or scenery
constraints.no_props: no items, tools, or objects in frame
constraints.no_grim: avoid serious, dark, or intimidating expressions

ui_validation.simplicity_test: no visual clutter or distracting elements
